UnprocessableEntity.description: Unprocessable Entity. The server understands the content type of the request entity but was unable to process the contained instructions.

status.description: Indicates whether the request was unsuccessful.

message.description: A brief description of the error, if any.
message.example: The request body contains invalid data.

error.description: Additional information about the error, if available.

status_code.description: The HTTP status code indicating an unprocessable entity error.
